${modID}:TrickMastery.NAME: Trick Mastery
${modID}:TrickMastery.FLAVOR: Might as well make it flashy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, draw another one.

${modID}:InvincibleStart.NAME: Invincible Start
${modID}:InvincibleStart.FLAVOR: You've been looking in the trees, huh.
DESCRIPTIONS: Negates #bALL damage received on the first turn.

${modID}:LastChance.NAME: Last Chance
${modID}:LastChance.FLAVOR: Unfortunate that this game has no lives system.
DESCRIPTIONS: If HP < #b1, reduces HP to #b1 instead of receiving a lethal hit.

${modID}:SafetyNet.NAME: Safety Net
${modID}:SafetyNet.FLAVOR: It's always morally correct to use damage boosting.
DESCRIPTIONS: When receiving damage, gain #y${modID}:Rings equivalent to the damage received at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:RingEnergy.NAME: Ring Energy
${modID}:RingEnergy.FLAVOR: This is an acceptable trade-off for a Boost Gauge, right ?
DESCRIPTIONS: When you end your turn, each of your #y${modID}:Rings has a #b

${modID}:TenSecondRing.NAME: 10-Second Rings
${modID}:TenSecondRing.FLAVOR: You kept them for more than ten seconds ! That's why you deserve a reward !
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you still have #y${modID}:Rings, gain #b

${modID}:SerialHoming.NAME: Serial Homing
${modID}:SerialHoming.FLAVOR: No, I don't have it in me to write a witty description about Boost games here.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you successfully trigger a #y${modID}:Cyloop_Finisher, draw a #yQuick #yHoming #yAttack in your hand.
